Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>漆黒の翼<White>か……楽しいヤツらだったぜ。 また会えるといいな……
Entry.EnglishText: The <Blue>Dark Wings<White>, huh... They're a fun bunch. I hope we meet them again...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>は波長が合いそうだけど、 ……ゴメン、ボクはパス！
Entry.EnglishText: You seem to be on the same wavelength as them, but... Sorry, I'm gonna have to pass!

Entry.JapaneseText: どういう意味だよ！ だっておまえだって、 気に入ってたじゃねーかよ！
Entry.EnglishText: What do you mean by that? I thought that you liked them, too!

Entry.JapaneseText: それとこれとは話が別！ 漆黒トリオに 付き合ってると疲れちゃうんだもん！
Entry.EnglishText: We're talking about different things! Being around the Dark Trio would just tire me out!

Entry.JapaneseText: やっぱ波長が合ってるんだ…… 四人目のメンバーになれば？
Entry.EnglishText: Yep, same wavelength indeed... How about you become their fourth member?
